Author: itsqueerinhere
Text: Sometimes I think I look kinda skinny in pictures and always look huuuge in mirrors. But sometimes in my bedroom I move from one mirror that I look fat in to one right beside it and think I look thinner, so who tf even knows anymore ðŸ˜‚

Author: bongshelter
Text: I'm the opposite. I don't let anyone take my picture because I always look ugly. An ugly, sad blob. It's even worse on video.  I don't like how I look in mirror either  but I can look at it without feeling bad about myself. Not pretty but not ugly either. Mostly okay. I try not to spend too much time looking at my face though.
